testcase.name: Submit feedback successfully with a high rating

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: Given the user is on the WOGAA Documentation website........................undefined And the Sentiments widget is visible........................................undefined When the user clicks the 'Help us improve' ribbon button....................undefined When the user selects a rating of 6.........................................undefined And the user chooses the contributing areas: "Website loaded fast, Easy to navigate".undefined And the user indicates their interest as "Mobile Applications, Informational Servicess".undefined And the user submits the feedback...........................................undefined Then the feedback should be submitted successfully..........................undefined
